title: Insert Data into a MySQL Database via a Python Script
author: Jack Wallen
description: What do you do with the data you have generated in your new Python application? Why not put it into a MySQL database? Here's how.
cntitle: 通过 Python 脚本将数据插入 MySQL 数据库
cndescription: 你如何处理你在新的 Python 应用程序中生成的数据？为什么不把它放到 MySQL 数据库中呢？方法如下。
